about_the_game:
Join the Celebration! Cats love getting together and partying, doing a variety of amusing things. And now, you can join them in their colorful celebrations.

You'll experience Rio's Vibrant Beach: Explore the electrifying ambiance of Copacabana during Reveillon in captivating visuals. Enjoy visually stunning illustrations created by Katia Numakura capturing the essence of Rio's festive energy, with crowds of cats and friends.

Features:

  • Cats and Friends: Search for charming characters amidst the festive scene, where you find stories in every frame.

  • Balloon-Popping Fun: While you look for the characters, relax popping the balloons throughout the beachscape. Relaxing and satisfying like popping bubble wrap!

  • Rich Details: Delight in intricate scenes filled with colorful decorations and beach revelry.

  • Festive Soundtrack: Groove to an exclusive bossa-nova soundtrack to immerse in the celebratory atmosphere.

  • Family-Friendly Fun: Suitable for all ages, an entertaining experience for the whole family.

Additional scenes are on the way

But wait, the celebration doesn't end here! The free Réveillon in Rio experience is only the first one. There's more to come! With your support, expect new celebration scenes as DLCs released over time.

  • Valentine’s Day

  • Olympicats

  • Comic Cat Con

Available on release: Join the creative community!

Explore the Community & Creative Maker!

Craft Personalized Scenes:

  • Dive into a user-friendly editor to design scenes of your dreams! Populate them with an array of characters, objects, and lively balloons.

  • Customize every detail, from festive decorations to playful interactions between characters. Your imagination sets the limits!

Community Sharing & Exploration:

  • Share Your Creations: Showcase your unique scenes with the wider Meow Moments community on the Steam Workshop. Let others experience your creative genius!

  • Explore Player-Created Scenes: Immerse yourself in a treasure trove of player-crafted content. Dive into a myriad of personalized scenes and discover the creativity of fellow players. Play scenes with elements from the scenes you own.

Seamless Integration:

  • Integration with Your Collection: Access and freely use all DLC scenes you own across the scenarios you create. Mix and match elements to build a unique celebration!

Available on release: New Year Activity Book DLC!

Includes a printable Activity Book in PDF format, with activities to relax:

  • Illustrations to colour

  • Spot the differences

  • Find the objects and characters in the crowd, and more!

PLUS: a mini game to play in the main game. Enjoy a cozy memory game to sharpen your mind.

Purchasing this will greatly support our studio to keep creating more content and more games!

Join the Celebration! Cats love getting together and partying, doing a variety of amusing things. And now, you can join them in their colorful celebrations.

You'll experience Rio's Vibrant Beach: Explore the electrifying ambiance of Copacabana during Reveillon in captivating visuals. Enjoy visually stunning illustrations created by Katia Numakura capturing the essence of Rio's festive energy, with crowds of cats and friends.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.3.+
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Dual Core - Intel only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Meow Moments: Celebrating Together

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT550M | AMD Radeon R7/HD 5650 | Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“If the new DLCs keep the quality of the main game, Meow Moments has the potential to become a go-to hub for hidden object/ kitten games. In any case, it’s a game that is more than worth it for fans of the genre.”
👍👍 – LadiesGamers

“I wasn't expecting anything other than a typical cat-searching game that could be completed in 5-minutes or less...an hour later, I realized I had stumbled onto a hidden gem of a game that was quite challenging and tons of fun to play.”
Recommended – Steam reviewer

“An easy recommendation and free to play. A wholesome game that anyone can play.”
Recommended – Steam reviewer
short_description: Join the feline festivities in special moments! Find cats friends in vibrant celebrations where popping balloons is as relaxing and satisfying as popping bubble wrap! To get off to a good start, celebrate Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro during the New Year.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
